title: Did I Mention Invention?
overview: Did I Mention Invention? brings viewers fascinating stories of invention while shining a light on everyday innovators. Alie presents reports of human ingenuity and inspiration from around the world. Viewers learn about innovators young and old, what it takes to bring their vision to life, and little-known facts about the history and process of invention and innovation. The show aims to ignite a spark within the hearts and minds of audiences, encouraging viewers to try their own hand at creating something new.
